tool_description: Get the latest Amazon offers and freebies that can be easily resold!
name: Amazon deals freebies
title: Amazon deals freebies

api_list.name: Amazon deals
api_list.description: This endpoint allow to recover last amazon deals
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://amazon-deals-freebies.p.rapidapi.com/amazon/deals"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "amazon-deals-freebies.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://amazon-deals-freebies.p.rapidapi.com/amazon/deals"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "amazon-deals-freebies.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
